text: Vettam Mani or Vettom Mani (27 August 1921 - 29 May 1987) was an eminent scholar and writer. His most famous work is the Purāņic Encyclopedia, which is a monumental and exhaustive study of Indian Puranas, epics and allied literature of Hinduism. It constituted the results of the author's devoted study and research extending over fourteen years. ==Publications== # Purāņic Encyclopedia, Published by DC Books. The English Translation is published by Motilal Banarsidass, . # English Gurunadan, Published by DC Books. # Hindi Gurunadhan , Published by DeAr Books.
